meanings.sent1: The small cage was very limiting for the bird.
meanings.sent2: The limiting rules made it hard to have fun at the party.
meanings.sent3: The limiting fence tried to keep the adventurous dog in the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her limiting beliefs held her back from reaching her full potential.
meanings.sent5: The limiting walls of the maze made it challenging to find the way out.

meanings.sent1: The limiting rope kept the boat from drifting away.
meanings.sent2: His limiting schedule made it difficult to meet up with friends.
meanings.sent3: The limiting lock on the gate made it tricky to enter the garden.
meanings.sent4: The limiting boundaries of the game added an extra challenge.
meanings.sent5: The limiting walls of the room made it feel cramped and small.

meanings.sent1: She was limiting the number of cookies her brother could eat.
meanings.sent2: Limiting the time spent on social media can improve productivity.
meanings.sent3: The magician was limiting the rabbit's ability to escape from the hat.
meanings.sent4: The teacher was limiting the topics for the research project.
meanings.sent5: The new law was limiting the use of plastic bags in the city.
